titleStmt.title: A decree of the Priuye Counsell at Westminster Anno 1.5.5.9.xx. October articles agreed uppon by the lordes and other the Quenes Maiesties Pryuy Counsayle, for a reformation of their seruauntes in certayne abuses of apparell ...
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Privy Council.
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: Bi Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cavvood, printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
